00016 
00017 bool SACMethodRANSAC::computeModel(){
00018 
00019          // Warn and exit if no threshold was set
00020      if (this->threshold == -1)
00021      {
00022        cout<<"[RANSAC::computeModel] No threshold set!"<<endl;
00023        return (false);
00024      }
00025 
00026 
00027      this->iterations = 0;
00028      int noMaxInliersFound = -DBL_MAX;
00029      double k = 1.0;
00030 
00031      std::vector<int> bestModel;
00032      std::vector<int> bestModelIndices, inliers;
00033      Eigen::VectorXd estimatedModelCoefficients;
00034 
00035      int noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00036 
00037 
00038      while (this->iterations < k)
00039      {
00040 
00041        //Compute a random model from the input pointcloud
00042        bool isDegenerate = false;
00043        bool modelFound = false;
00044        this->objectModel->computeRandomModel(this->iterations,estimatedModelCoefficients,isDegenerate,modelFound);
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048        if (!isDegenerate) break;
00049 
00050        if(!modelFound){
00051 
00052            this->iterations++;
00053            continue;
00054        }
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058        // The inliers within the user-defined threshold are selected
00059        this->objectModel->selectWithinDistance (estimatedModelCoefficients, this->threshold, inliers);
00060        noInliersCurrentModel = inliers.size ();
00061 
00062 
00063        //Select the best model estimation. The number of inliers in the model
00064        //will be maximized
00065        if (noInliersCurrentModel > noMaxInliersFound)
00066        {
00067          noMaxInliersFound = noInliersCurrentModel;
00068 
00069          // Save the current model/inlier/coefficients selection as being the best so far
00070          this->inliers            = inliers;
00071          this->modelCoefficients = estimatedModelCoefficients;
00072 
00073          // Compute the k parameter (k=log(z)/log(1-w^n))
00074          double w = (double)((double)noInliersCurrentModel / (double)this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize());
00075          double pNoOutliers = 1 - pow (w, (double)this->objectModel->getNumberOfSamplesRequired());
00076          pNoOutliers = std::max (std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon (), pNoOutliers);       // Avoid division by -Inf
00077          pNoOutliers = std::min (1 - std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon (), pNoOutliers);   // Avoid division by 0.
00078          k = log (1 - this->probability) / log (pNoOutliers);
00079        }
00080 
00081 
00082        this->iterations++;
00083 
00084        if (this->iterations > this->maxIterations)
00085        {
00086            cout<<"[RANSAC::computeModel] RANSAC reached the maximum number of trials";
00087          break;
00088        }
00089 
00090      }
00091 
00092 
00093      if (this->inliers.size() == 0)
00094        return (false);
00095      return (true);
00096 }
00097 
00098 }
